royal_backing.description: An employee of the royal family. Unconditional access to part time jobs and academy classes. Monthly salary of 1000g.
royal_backing.name: Roya Backing

ink_mage.description:
A mage with an affinity for ink. A rare non-combat variant of the mage class. 
As a non-combat class, stat gains from leveling up are low, combat skills are difficult to acquire, and experience can be obtained for non-combat actions.
ink_mage.name: Ink Mage

gray.description:
An autonomous combat golem created by Hiyori.
Has a surprisingly high power level, but you would never let her fight.
A small amount of mana is used daily for recharging.
gray.name: Gray

big_potato.description:
A big potato you brought home. For some reason.
Every once in a while, you bring it out so people could 'behold' it.
It's a potato.
big_potato.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Skill Icon/Resized/potato.png
big_potato.name: Big Potato

detergent.description:
An almost empty bottle of detergent you found in a closet.
According to you, it's proof that you're the princess of the Cleaning Kingdom.
Smells like peppermint.
detergent.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Skill Icon/Resized/detergent01_01.png
detergent.name: Detergent Bottle

log.description:
A log that could have became an angel.
Looking at it fills one with hope.
...Or so you say.
log.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Skill Icon/Resized/log.png
log.name: Angel's Log

tasty_mushroom.description:
A mushroom you dug up. Looking at it fills your mouth with drool.
Something tells you not to cook it, apparently, so you've been keeping it safe.
tasty_mushroom.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Skill Icon/Resized/mushroom1_01.png
tasty_mushroom.name: Tasty Mushroom

bottle_of_spring_water.description:
Spring Water you bottled yourself. Not particularly magical, but quite tasty and refreshing nontheless.

Drinking it fills one with courage
...Or so you say.
bottle_of_spring_water.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Skill Icon/Resized/potion3_01.png
bottle_of_spring_water.name: Bottle of Spring Water

class_change_card.description:
A blue I.D. card allowing access to the class change hall for tier 1 classes.
By design, it doesn't update your information after being printed, so you would need to print a new one to update your information.
For various reasons, it's best to class change on your birthday, so have this ready at the end of the year.
class_change_card.name: Class Change Card

class_change_card_witch.description:
A slightly ominous black I.D. card which allows access to the tier 0 class change hall.
Similar to other class change cards, you need to print a new one to update your information.
Because it's a class change within the same tier, certain penalties will be applied after class change.
class_change_card_witch.name: Class Change Card
